member.name: T:NewShore.APSP.Common.Logger
member.summary: Proxy Class that implements the method to store the logs of the Aplication. This class uses to obtain the class of the current Loggin system defined in the Web.cofing in the attribute idLogger. Currently this project is using Loggly System (idLogger = 1)
